title: Figure out how to navigate macOS (accessibility, automation)
description: Research and document how to effectively control macOS - accessibility permissions, AppleScript, keyboard simulation, browser automation, etc. Create a knowledge base for future reference.

actions.note: Dave requested - need better macOS automation skills
Starting research on macOS automation capabilities

Tested AppleScript capabilities. Updated .claude/knowledge/macos/automation.md with findings. Key results: notifications, dialogs, clipboard, app listing, Safari/Terminal scripting work. Keystroke/click automation requires accessibility permissions.
